text.part-1: At Nirvati, we are committed to developing a powerful, open source server management software that offers a wide range of features to users around the world.
text.part-2: We believe that everyone should have access to the tools they need to manage their servers efficiently and securely, and we work hard to make that a reality.
text.part-3: Donating to us is a great way to support our mission and help us continue to develop and improve our software.
text.part-4: Your contributions help us to achieve the following goals:

goals.goal-1: Spend more time on the project
goals.goal-2: Operate our free HTTPS certificate service on nirvati.me
goals.goal-4: Provide development servers for testing and experimentation
goals.goal-5: Host a container registry (for downloading Nirvati)
goals.goal-6: Operate a community chat and forum
